Daemos finally turns around, nodding to Anachronox.

Daemos: Yes, thank you. (he switches channel to join Pacifix) Go to 
the base of the obelisk forming the Shadow Destiny. I will send Tankor 
there, and he will wait for you there. Daemos out. (changes channel) 
Tankor, please go meet Pacifix at the entrance, please.

Tankor goes to the entrance and waits there.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Pacifix / Anachronox --
> 
> Anachronox is silent as he slowly understands why Daemos doesn't 
> want him to harm Pacifix. <Ahh, I understand, Pacifix is an ally. 
> Well, as long as he doesn't try anything, he will stay an ally.> 
> Nodding to Daemos, the large dark bot speaks, "Alright. I will speak 
> with Pacifix and await his decision. I don't think he'll find 
> anything though. I'm a Tripred, not an Autobot." From his words, 
> Anachronox had dismissed the possibiltiy of himself ever being an 
> Autobot.
> 
> --------------------------
> 
> Pacifix passes throught the shields, and opens a commlink to 
> Daemos. "Daemos, Pacifix here. I just arrived where should I enter?" 
> The Autobot Commander comes up to the base, "Pacifix, Transform!" 
> His second half dissapears and his front half transforms into his 
> robot mode. A pensive look crosses his face as he regards the Shadow 
> Destiny, calmly awaiting a reply by Daemos.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Daemos: No Anachronox, you do not get it. Pacifix and the 
> Tripredacus 
> > are in good terms and I want to keep it this way. You shall meet 
> > Pacifix anyways, and you will tell him about your wishes. He is 
> > heading for our base at this moment and should arrive shortly. His 
> > priority is to find if there are any means to bring back 
> Firedrill. If 
> > he finds none, then...
